amendatorysection.catchline: ACTS CEDING TO THE UNITED STATES JURISDICTION OVER CERTAIN LANDS IN NEBRASKA
amendatorysection.para: Fort MacPherson National Cemetery. Laws 1939, Chapter 93, p. 406.
North Platte Weather Observation Station. Laws 1907, Chapter 145, p. 456.
Postoffice in Omaha. Laws 1889, Chapter 63, p. 494.
Postoffice in any city of the State. Laws 1889, Chapter 65, p. 498.
Fort Robinson and Fort Niobrara. Laws 1887, Chapter 83, p. 628.
Nebraska City Federal Buildings. Laws 1883, Chapter 90, p. 335.
